BRUINS on a 7-Game Skid – Could Tortorella Take Over?
To stream KARE 11 on your phone, you need the KARE 11 app.
Download the KARE 11 app
The Bruins are on a 7-game skid, their worst in 25 years. Could John Tortorella be the next coach? Locked On Bruins breaks down the speculation and what's next.
